basic.name: Soul Rip (Q)
basic.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 damage and healing Malthael for 25 per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

basic.name: Wraith Strike (W)
basic.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

basic.name: Death Shroud (E)
basic.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

heroic.name: Tormented Souls (R)
heroic.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

heroic.name: Last Rites (R)
heroic.description: {highlight}Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Heal 100% of the damage dealt.{/highlight}

trait.name: Reaper's Mark (T)
trait.description: Basic Attacks cleave in an area in front of Malthael and afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.  Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health every 1 second. {highlight}Malthael can interact with dead bodies destroying their souls. This interaction takes 3 seconds.{/highlight}
passives: Malthael receive 2% extra experience in the end of the game everytime he participates on a Nephalem takedown and 1% for other humans

1.name: Death's Reach
1.description: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%. {highlight}Instantly kill troops while under Reaper's Mark effect. Setting it's cooldown to 0.25 and refunding mana if a troop was the primary target.{/highlight}

1.name: On a Pale Horse
1.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted. {highlight}While mounted increase mana regeneration by 300%.{/highlight}

1.name: Fear the Reaper
1.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds. {highlight}Each Time Malthael go through an unit he gains a charge of dodge that lasts 3 seconds.{/highlight}

4.name: Die Alone
4.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

4.name: Cold Hand
4.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Soul Siphon
4.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

7.name: Throwing Shade
7.description: Increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 30. Death Shroud's initial impact deals 2% maximum Health as damage to non-Structure enemies.

7.name: Black Harvest
7.quest: : Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.
rewards: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.
7.description: {highlight}Receive 15 physical armor while one enemy hero is affected by Reaper's Mark{/highlight}

7.name: Massacre
7.description: {highlight}Activate to fear enemies close to Malthael for 1.25 seconds after 0.25 seconds.{/highlight}
7.cooldown: 2000 healing on enemy heroes marked with Reaper's Mark

10.name: Tormented Souls
10.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

10.name: Last Rites
10.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. {highlight}Heal 100% of the damage dealt.{/highlight}

13.name: Touch of Death
13.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by {highlight}75%{/highlight} for 4 seconds.

13.name: Inevitable End
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
13.description: {highlight}Activate to after 2 seconds, Steal 15 spell armor from each enemy Hero affliected by Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

16.name: Soul Collector
16.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%. {highlight}Soul Rip increase the current Reaper's Mark damage by 10% each time it hits the enemy.{/highlight}

16.name: Mortality
16.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 8% of the Hero's maximum Health. {highlight}Damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.{/highlight}

16.name: Memento Mori
16.description: {highlight}Activate to use a charge of Essence of death decreasing every respawn time by 7% of it's current time for each charge.{/highlight}

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration. {highlight}Tormentend Souls steals 1% maximum health of every hero on the area each second. Lasts 4 seconds{/highlight}

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: {highlight}Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms.{/highlight}

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area. {highlight}While on the trail extends it's time up to 2 seconds and makes Malthael unkillable{/highlight}

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: {highlight}Malthael traverse through terrain and can't be unmounted by damage{/highlight}
